info.description: This is the Sovrabase API server.
info.title: Sovrabase API

post.summary: Create an User (Need to be authentified)

get.summary: Get overall metric usage of the server
Return the list of organisation created on the server
Get a list of all projects created on the Server
Get the list of available project, (depending on permissions the user have)
Get a list of API Key.

post.summary: Create a new Public API Key (Can be used on any front end)
Login a new user in the project !
Remove a session of the User !
Signup a new User in the project.
Start a new transaction (Usefull for postgres Database only)
Commit every subsequent query you did between !
Rollback modification you did (during a Transaction only !)
Delete a Batch with specific filters ! (Combine query and delete at once !)
Query the database on a collection aka table (Select QUERY only)

get.summary: Execution logs from a function (List of call by usages..)
Logs of the project (Only include Organisations logs, not clients calls)

delete.summary: Delete a member of the project

get.summary: Get a specific role in a project.

post.summary: Delete files in a batch operations !

password.description: Only set if password was not provided in request
